list_definition.mean_english: sự đau khổ, sự buồn phiền
list_definition.definition: (something which causes) pain of mind or grief

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He felt great sorrow when she died.

list_ex_of_english: He has shared in our joys; he has shared in our sorrows.
I am just astonished that it is possible for anybody to endeavour to make political capital out of the sorrows and sufferings of people, but such is the situation.
I never, perhaps, have been very good at guessing accurately at secret sorrows.
Secondly, despite all the sorrows and talk of sorrows, there is hope.
Real sorrows now lead to real fears and real fears to intransigence and intransigence to the entrenchment of prejudice, violence and destruction.
As we have from time to time expressed our sympathy in their sorrows, so to-day we express our infinite joy in their great rejoicing.
We think of him as a man of faith who bore with courage both his own sickness and many sorrows.
I am glad that other's sorrows made me sad.
